casename: Yap Boon Sim (intended administration of the estate of Goh Jik Lian, deceased) v Dr Lee Meng Kuan and Another
counsel: Kuah Boon Theng and Suji Sasidharan (Tan & Lim) for the plaintiff; Karuppan Chettiar, Renuka Chettiar and Prasana (Karuppan Chettiar & Partners) for the first defendant; Tan Tian Luh (Helen Yeo & Partners) for the second defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Parties/Locus standi/Action by dependant of deceased/Action commenced within six months of deceased's death/No executor or administrator appointed yet/Whether action premature/Whether action should be dismissed/s 20(4) Civil Law Act (Cap 43)
